titleStmt.title: Edinburgh, the thirteenth day of January, one thousand six hundred and eighty two years. The which day the lord provost, baillies, council, and deacons of crafts, being conveened in council, appoints the price of the coach-hire from any part of the city to the abbay, and from the abbay to the city ...
titleStmt.author: Edinburgh (Scotland). Town Council.
Rocheid, James.
